content: Thanks for the insightful perspective Daniel! I suspect that some of the negative reaction could be based in a lack of confidence in the value those designers bring to the table. Those of us that identify with the title of designer should be focused on creating outstanding, relevant solutions. I always like to consider the role of designers in the context John Maeda describes, “Design is a solution to a problem. Art is a question to a problem.” Maybe the naysayers are artists pretending to be designers ;)
